did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Golden Queen Mining and Milling Company records 1895-1898

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Golden Queen Mining and Milling Company.

did.abstract: Golden Queen Mining and Milling Company was a New Orleans, La. company with mining interests located in Cochise County, Arizona Territory. Collection includes holograph minutes, by-laws, and stock register on printed forms. Also includes incorporation papers and minutes of stockholders meetings (Sept. to Oct. 1893) of the Maricopa Mica Mining Company, a related company.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

scopecontent.p: Holograph minutes, by-laws, and stock register on printed forms. Also includes incorporation papers and minutes of stockholders meetings (Sept. to Oct. 1893) of the Maricopa Mica Mining Company, a related company.
